en.slogan: A lot of knowledge is a dangerous thing, but so is a few.
en.author: Albert Einstein

en.slogan: Every problems of the world could be settled easily, if men were only willig to think.
en.author: Thomas J. Watson Jr.

hu.slogan: A sok tudás veszélyes, de a kevés veszélyesebb.
hu.author: Albert Einstein

hu.slogan: A világon minden probléma megoldható lenne, ha az emberek hajlandóak lennének gondolkozni.
hu.author: Thomas J. Watson Jr.
